128cf036ae32f2b8ae4a5d7dcb2e0bb71c686ca3.query:
INSERT INTO sessions 
            (profile_id, ip_address, user_agent)
            VALUES 
            ($1, $2, $3)
            RETURNING session_id

2624eb5076ea34c375065c6dccc6f7b82c90ef76.query:
SELECT profile_id
            FROM sessions
            WHERE session_id = $1
            AND (hmac(session_token,
                  (SELECT s.value
                   FROM session_secrets s
                   WHERE s.status = 'active'),
                  'sha512') = decode($1, 'hex')
                OR hmac(session_token,
                        (SELECT s.value
                         FROM session_secrets s
                         WHERE s.status = 'phase_out'),
                        'sha512') = decode($1, 'hex')
                )

6ca2c005e081961a019179e1c0cbe8be263ddb65.query:
SELECT profiles.id, pwd_hash
            FROM profiles JOIN emails
                ON profiles.id = emails.profile_id
            WHERE emails.address = $1;

f8075a593bab3363c9d8493328a11b2179a79038.query:
WITH profile0 AS (
                INSERT INTO profiles (username, pwd_hash)
                    VALUES ($1, $2)
                    RETURNING id)
            INSERT
            INTO emails (profile_id, address)
            SELECT id, $3
            FROM profile0
            RETURNING profile_id AS id;
